Usage example

Controller code:


            this.number = 'Dos';
            this.numbers = ['Un', 'Dos', 'Tres'];

In template:


            <ul>
                <li ng-repeat="number in mainCtrl.numbers">
                    <lp-custom-radio ng-model="mainCtrl.number" value="{{ number }}" name="lp-radio">
                        {{ number }}
                    </lp-custom-radio>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <lp-custom-radio ng-disabled="true" name="lp-radio">
                        Disabled
                    </lp-custom-radio>
                </li>
                <li>
                    Value selected: {{ mainCtrl.number }}
                </li>
            </ul>

Demo:

  • {{ number }}
  • Disabled
  • Value selected: {{ mainCtrl.number }}
